Make take a year to recover? I don't care. If my Store of Value is volatile. I'm smart enough to "store" it during down periods or sell and buy back cheaper during these times. But I think Bitcoin is more than a store of value
Alex Krüger
@krugermacro
 · Jul 5, 2018
#Bitcoin as a Store of Value has been trash. Downside volatility is the most important factor as far as SOV goes, and bitcoin's is huge. BTC is down ~70% from its peak. It may take a years to recover. About half investors are down >50% since 2017, and most people got in in 2017.
